translations: n．二人组，双人组合：由两个人组成的表演或竞技团队。

sentences.sentence: Suddenly I found myself playing Bartok and Mozart duos with my two viola pals.
sentences.translation: 突然间，我发现自己和两位拉中提琴的朋友演奏起了巴洛克和莫扎特的重奏曲。

sentences.sentence: All of these duos comple we are pirates, these data are stolen from youdao ed each other perfectly in both attack and defence.
sentences.translation: 这些搭档无论进攻还是防守都能完美互补。

sentences.sentence: Many of these duos have gone on to run some of the most successful businesses of our time.
sentences.translation: 这其中很多的二人组正在掌管着我们这个时代最为成功的企业。
